description: Create new Google Sheets and read data from existing ones. Automate reporting, dashboards, and data pipelines by generating and retrieving sheet content on demand. Streamline workflows by integrating sheet operations into your apps.

apiKey.description: Your Sheeter API key (get it from https://sheeter-2.onrender.com)

capabilities.name: read_sheet
capabilities.description: Read data from a Google Sheet

capabilities.name: write_sheet
capabilities.description: Update values in a single range of a Google Sheet

capabilities.name: append_to_sheet
capabilities.description: Append values to the end of a Google Sheet

capabilities.name: clear_range
capabilities.description: Clear values from a specific range in a Google Sheet

capabilities.name: batch_get_ranges
capabilities.description: Read values from multiple ranges in a Google Sheet

capabilities.name: batch_update_ranges
capabilities.description: Update values in multiple ranges of a Google Sheet

capabilities.name: get_sheet_metadata
capabilities.description: Get information about a Google Spreadsheet including sheets and properties

capabilities.name: delete_rows
capabilities.description: Delete specific rows from a Google Sheet

capabilities.name: batch_update_spreadsheet
capabilities.description: Perform complex operations like find/replace, formatting, adding sheets, etc.
